news.Title: [AI Summary] 采鈺11月營收年減8.42%，近期股價呈現震盪整理
news.Content: • 采鈺本週股價呈現震盪整理，過去一週股價變動幅度為 -0.56%。, • 采鈺公布11月合併營收為7.84億元，年減8.42% [1]。公司於11月完成限制員工權利新股收回註銷，實收資本額變更登記 [2]。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 2則 | 資料期間：2025-11-26 至 2025-12-10 | 新聞數量：2 則 采鈺（6789）近期股價呈現震盪整理，最新收盤價為265.00元，較前一日上漲3.11%，但回顧近一週，股價變動幅度為-0.56%。根據公開資訊，采鈺於2025年11月公布了11月份的合併營收資訊。該公司於2025年12月10日公告，11月份合併營收達7.84億元，相較去年同期減少了8.42% [1]。此營收數據的表現，可能是影響近期股價波動的因素之一。 在公司營運方面，采鈺於2025年11月26日發布公告，說明其限制員工權利新股的收回註銷已完成，並辦理了實收資本額的變更登記事宜 [2]。此次資本變動後，公司實收資本額略有減少。儘管營收數據顯示年減，但公司在資本結構上的調整也為市場關注的焦點。整體而言，采鈺近期營運消息主要集中在營收表現與資本結構的變動，股價則在這些消息的影響下，呈現區間整理格局。

news.Title: [AI Summary] VisEra's November Revenue Decreases 8.42% Year-on-Year, Stock Price Shows Recent Volatility
news.Content: • VisEra stock has shown recent volatility, with a weekly price change of -0.56%., • VisEra announced November consolidated revenue of NT$784 million, a year-on-year decrease of 8.42% [1]. The company also completed the cancellation of restricted stock options and the registration of changes in its paid-in capital in November [2]. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance Taiwan: 2 articles | Period: 2025-11-26 to 2025-12-10 | Number of News: 2 VisEra (6789) has experienced recent stock price volatility, closing at NT$265.00, up 3.11% from the previous day. However, over the past week, the stock has seen a decline of 0.56%. According to public disclosures, VisEra released its November consolidated revenue figures on December 10, 2025. The company reported NT$784 million in consolidated revenue for November, marking an 8.42% decrease compared to the same period last year [1]. This revenue performance may be a contributing factor to the recent fluctuations in its stock price. In terms of corporate operations, VisEra announced on November 26, 2025, the completion of the cancellation of its restricted stock options and the subsequent registration of changes in its paid-in capital [2]. This adjustment to the company's capital structure has resulted in a slight reduction in its total paid-in capital. While the revenue figures indicate a year-on-year decline, the company's adjustments to its capital structure are also a point of interest for the market. Overall, recent operational news for VisEra has primarily focused on its revenue performance and changes in its capital structure, with the stock price consolidating within a trading range influenced by these developments.
